scripts.clone-deps-all: cd ./ensemble-stack-d1; rm -R node_modules; cp -R ../node_modules node_modules; cd ../ensemble-modal; rm -R node_modules; cp -R ../node_modules node_modules; cp ../{babel.config.json,gulpfile.js} .; cd ../ensemble-lightbox; rm -R node_modules; cp -R ../node_modules node_modules; cp ../{babel.config.json,gulpfile.js} .; cd ../ensemble-social-share; rm -R node_modules; cp -R ../node_modules node_modules; cp ../{babel.config.json,gulpfile.js} .
scripts.clone-gulpfile-all: cd ./ensemble-modal; cp ../gulpfile.js .; cd ../ensemble-lightbox; cp ../gulpfile.js .; cd ../ensemble-social-share; cp ../gulpfile.js .
scripts.git-push-all: cd ./ensemble; git push origin master; cd ../ensemble-stack-d1; git push origin master; cd ../ensemble-modal; git push origin master; cd ../ensemble-lightbox; git push origin master; cd ../ensemble-social-share; git push origin master
